title: Basic SpeechRecognition tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to generate a touch button on your device.

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the camera locally.

Move the **enabled**

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/button.png)

and the **event**

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/event.png)components into the workspace

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/Log.png) on the sidebar,

move the **print** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/print.png)
and put the text component in the print component as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/log.png)
this is for you to see on the console what your smartphone is recognizing from what you are saying

Now add the event component as in the image below

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/simplebutton/touchbutton/blocks.png)
